definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: They are also judged by student test scores.
sentences.chinese: 還將通過學生考試成績對教師進行考評。

sentences.english: A multiperson comparison that requires the evaluator to list employees in order from lowest to highest.
sentences.chinese: 要求考評者將員工按從高到低的順序加以排列。

sentences.english: Chapter four is the project of Hua Xia Bank, Liaocheng Branch's performance evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是華夏銀行聊城分行績效考評體系方案。

sentences.english: Emphasize that company"s budget tests and assesses and stimulates machine-made union."
sentences.chinese: 強調公司的預算考評和激勵機制的結合。

sentences.english: To establish the evaluation agency of Wushu Ranks System in Shijiazhuang colleges.
sentences.chinese: 建立石家莊普通高校武術段位制考評機構。

sentences.english: Some Chinese officials have instituted polls to assess performance.
sentences.chinese: 一些官員還在績效考評中引入了調查手段。
擴大績效考評試點範圍。

sentences.english: Be in charge of the management and appraisal of PIC department staffs.
sentences.chinese: 對資材部門員工進行考評和管理。

sentences.english: We like to use a variety of methods to give the students a fair chance.
sentences.chinese: 我們傾向於用多種方法考評學生以示公平。

sentences.english: Application of KPI and balance-records method on the design of the examination system.
sentences.chinese: 運用KPI法和平衡記分卡法進行考評體系設計。

sentences.english: He is the National examinant of Vocational Skills examinatorial Center for evaluation staff beauticians .
sentences.chinese: 爲國家職業技能考評中心美容師考評員。

sentences.english: He is the National examinant of Vocational Skills examinatorial Center for evaluation staff beauticians .
sentences.chinese: 爲國家職業技能考評中心美容師考評員。

sentences.english: The HKEAA may ask for documentary proof.
sentences.chinese: 考評局或會要求提供證明文件作覈對用。

definition: to confer/to consult/to negotiate/to hold a conference
to determine the recipient of an award through discussion
full-time/to appoint sb to a specific task
to make secret inquiries/to investigate in secret
